duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain records, reports, and issue correspondence related to quality control and supplier performance.
Review and identify problems, provide direction and advice to correct such problems, and create improvement action plans as required.
Manage IATF 16949 and ISO as the management representative and audit controller.
Create and maintain inspection methods and standards, and act as a customer window for quality-related issues.
Initiate RCA, problem investigation, and track monthly findings for repairs/NCM.
Initiate and control FMEA/PQCT, manage IMDS, and perform other duties as assigned.
